name: Quick Thinking
text: If this skill test is successful by 2 or more, after it resolves, you may immediately take an action as if it were your turn (this acton does not count toward the number of actions you can take each turn).

name: Rite of Seeking
text: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Investigate. Investigate using [willpower] instead of [intellect]. If you succeed, discover 2 additional clues at this location. If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol is revealed during this test, after this test resolves lose all remaining actions and immediately end your turn.
